mapper.insert: insert seq,movie_name movieName, rank_date into movie values (#{seq},#{movieName},#{rankDate})
mapper.update: update set movie_name = #{movieName} from movie where movie_no like #{movieNo}
mapper.delete: delete from movie where movie_no like #{movieNo}
mapper.select: parameterType="String" select movie_no movieNo, seq,movie_name movieName, rank_date rankDate from movie where movie_no = #{value}
